text: Abasuubili abasatsa nende abasuubili abakhasi ni abetsa abeene khubeene, balomesaninjia okhukhola amalayi ne bakananinjia okhukhola amabii. Ne balumililanga okhulaama ne bahininjia eshihanwa, ne bawulilanga Nyasaye nende Omurumwa wuwe, abo Nyasaye alabahelesia tsimbabaasi. Toto Nyasaye niwa amani Owamachesi muno
